TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsPrincipal extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal

summary.span: 實作，其支援多個宣告式身分識別。

span.span: An implementation that supports multiple claims-based identities.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和宣告式身分識別已完全整合至.NET Framework。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 這表示現在代表主體，以.NET Framework 中的許多類別衍生自而非僅只實作介面。This means that many classes that represent a principal in the .NET Framework now derive from rather than simply implementing the interface. 除了實作以外介面，公開屬性和方法可用於使用宣告。In addition to implementing the interface, exposes properties and methods that are useful for working with claims. 會公開一個身分集合，每個都是。 exposes a collection of identities, each of which is a . 常見的情況下，這個集合，透過存取屬性，只會有單一項目。In the common case, this collection, which is accessed through the property, will only have a single element. 引進在.NET 4.5 中做為主體從其中衍生最主要的類別不會強制您變更任何項目在您處理身分識別的方式。The introduction of in .NET 4.5 as the principal from which most principal classes derive does not force you to change anything in the way in which you deal with identity. 不過它會開啟更多可能性並提供更多的機會來施行更細微的存取控制。It does, however open up more possibilities and offer more chances to exercise finer access control. 例如：For example: - 應用程式程式碼本身可以直接使用目前的主體中包含的宣告，以額外的驗證、 授權和個人化工作。The application code itself can work directly with the claims contained in the current principal to drive extra authentication, authorization, and personalization tasks. - 您可以利用處理管線，可處理驗證要求和授權原則執行觸達您的程式碼之前宣告前端您的資源。You can front your resources with a claims processing pipeline, which can deal with authentication requests and authorization policy even before execution reaches your code. 比方說，您可以設定 web 應用程式或服務使用的自訂宣告驗證管理員時，衍生自類別的執行個體類別。For example, you can configure a web-based application or service with a custom claims authentication manager, an instance of a class that derives from the class. 如此設定，會叫用要求處理管線方法，在您將傳遞給它的宣告驗證管理員表示傳入要求的內容。When so configured, the request processing pipeline invokes the method on your claims authentication manager passing it a that represents the context of the incoming request. 您的宣告驗證管理員接著可以執行的連入宣告的值為基礎的驗證。Your claims authentication manager can then perform authentication based on the values of the incoming claims. 它也可以篩選、 轉換或將宣告新增至連入宣告集。It can also filter, transform, or add claims to the incoming claim set. 比方說，它可用來擴充設定從本機資料來源，例如本機使用者設定檔建立新的宣告與連入宣告For example, it could be used to enrich the incoming claim set with new claims created from a local data source such as a local user profile - 您可以使用自訂宣告授權管理員中，衍生自類別的執行個體來設定 web 應用程式類別。You can configure a web-based application with a custom claims authorization manager, an instance of a class that derives from the class. 當這樣設定，要求處理管線會封裝傳入中，並叫用您宣告授權管理員上的方法。When so configured, the request processing pipeline packages the incoming in an and invokes the method on your claims authorization manager. 您的宣告授權管理員接著可以強制執行連入宣告為基礎的授權。Your claims authorization manager can then enforce authorization based on the incoming claims. - 可以使用自訂宣告授權管理員中設定您的應用程式，並使用其中一個執行的內嵌宣告式程式碼存取檢查類別來執行必要的存取檢查或執行宣告式存取檢查。Inline claims-based code access checks can be performed by configuring your application with a custom claims authorization manager and using either the class to perform imperative access checks or the to perform declarative access checks. 宣告式程式碼存取檢查會執行的內嵌、 外部處理管線中，並因此可用於所有應用程式，只要設定宣告授權管理員。Claims-based code access checks are performed inline, outside of the processing pipeline, and so are available to all applications as long as a claims authorization manager is configured. 您可以取得轉換相關聯的 RP 應用程式 （或執行執行緒的主體） 中的要求主體的執行個體屬性設。You can obtain a instance for the principal associated with a request in an RP application (or the principal under which a thread is executing) by casting the property to . 與相關聯的宣告物件都是透過其屬性。The claims associated with an object are available through its property. 屬性會傳回所有主體相關聯的身分識別所包含的宣告。The property returns all of the claims contained by the identities associated with the principal. 在罕見的情況下，所在包含多個執行個體，您可以使用屬性，或者您可以使用存取主要的身分識別屬性。In the uncommon case in which the contains multiple instances, you can use the property or you can access the primary identity by using the property. 提供數種方法可能會搜尋這些宣告，並完全支援 Language Integrated Query (LINQ)。 provides several methods through which these claims may be searched and fully supports Language Integrated Query (LINQ). 身分識別可以藉由新增到主體或方法。Identities can be added to the principal by using the or methods. > [!NOTE] > 若要新增的身分識別，呼叫端必須具有完全信任。To add identities to the , a caller must have full trust. 根據預設，WIF 會設定優先權物件時選取要透過傳回的主要身分識別屬性。By default, WIF prioritizes objects when selecting the primary identity to return through the property. 您可以藉由提供透過委派來修改此行為執行選取的屬性。You can modify this behavior by supplying a delegate through the property to perform the selection. 屬性會提供類似的功能，如屬性。The property provides similar functionality for the property. 在宣告為基礎的模型，在指定的角色中的主體是否取決於提供其基礎的身分識別的宣告。In the claim-based model, whether a principal is in a specified role is determined by the claims presented by its underlying identities. 方法基本上會檢查以判斷它是否擁有含有指定的角色值的宣告主體相關聯的每個身分識別。The method essentially examines each identity associated with the principal to determine whether it possesses a claim with the specified role value. 宣告的型別 (由其屬性) 來判斷應該檢查哪些宣告角色期間檢查指定的身分識別，透過其屬性。The type of the claim (represented by its property) used to determine which claims should be examined during role checks is specified on an identity through its property. 因此，角色檢查期間檢查的宣告可以是不同的型別不同於這個主體相關聯的身分識別。Thus, the claims examined during role checks can be of a different type for different identities associated with the principal. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取 HTTP 要求中的使用者提供的宣告，並將其寫入至 HTTP 回應。The following example extracts the claims presented by a user in an HTTP request and writes them to the HTTP response. 目前的使用者讀取做為。The current user is read from the as a . 宣告再從中讀取，並接著會寫入至回應。The claims are then read from it and then are written to the response. ```csharp ClaimsPrincipal principal = HttpContext.Current.User as ClaimsPrincipal; if (null != principal) { foreach (Claim claim in principal.Claims) { Response.Write("CLAIM TYPE: " + claim.Type + "; CLAIM VALUE: " + claim.Value + "
"); } } ```

summary.span: 取得集合，其中包含來自與這個宣告主體相關聯的所有宣告身分識別之所有宣告。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all of the claims from all of the claims identities associated with this claims principal.

value.span: 與這個主體相關聯的宣告。

span.span: The claims associated with this principal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告主體擁有集合存取透過身分識別屬性的物件。A claims principal has a collection of objects that is accessible through the Identities property. 每個集合中包含一個或多個宣告。Each in the collection contains one or more claims. 屬性會傳回所有宣告身分識別，這個集合中所有的宣告。The property returns all of the claims from all of the claims identities in this collection. 屬性可檢查的自訂實作所來進行驗證決策，或是篩選、 轉換或擴充連入宣告集; 類別的自訂實作類別，以強制執行授權原則;或由應用程式程式碼來製作授權決策，或自訂使用者體驗會根據集合中的宣告。The property can be examined by custom implementations of the class to make authentication decisions or to filter, transform, or enrich an incoming claim set; by custom implementations of the class to enforce authorization policy; or by application code to make authorization decisions or to customize user experience based on the claims present in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，架構進行優先順序處理的型別身分識別傳回身分識別時。By default, the framework prioritizes identities of type when returning the identity. 第一個中找到則會傳回集合。The first found in the collection is returned. 如果沒有任何在集合中，第一次的身分識別可從會傳回。If there is no in the collection, the first identity assignable from is returned. 如果沒有任何，`null`會傳回。If there is no , `null` is returned. 如果集合是空的就會擲回。If the collection is empty, an is thrown. 您可以設定來變更預設行為屬性來指定要呼叫來判斷的身分識別委派。You can change the default behavior by setting the property to specify a delegate to be called to determine the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查此宣告主體所擁有的身分識別是否包含型別的宣告宣告的值等於所指定的值`role`參數。The method checks whether an identity that this claims principal possesses contains a claim of type where the value of the claim is equal to the value specified by the `role` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 每個有它自己的定義，代表角色的宣告型別。Each has its own definition of the claim type that represents a role. 這種宣告類型可以存取，而且透過設定屬性。This claim type can be accessed and set through the property.
